mapper.select: select id, sn, name, address, longitude, latitude, product_key, device_name, device_secret, usable_status, power_status, online_status, model_id, version, fully_charged, service_phone, business_time, create_time, update_time, del_flag from electricity.t_electricity_cabinet where del_flag=0 and id = #{id}

select count(eb.id) from t_electricity_cabinet as ec left join t_electricity_cabinet_box as ecb on ec.id=ecb.electricity_cabinet_id left join t_electricity_battery as eb on ecb.electricity_battery_id is not null and ecb.electricity_battery_id=eb.id where eb.capacity>=fully_charged and ec.id = #{id}

select ebm.voltage as voltage,ebm.capacity as capacity from t_electricity_cabinet as ec left join t_electricity_cabinet_box as ecb on ec.id=ecb.electricity_cabinet_id left join t_electricity_battery as eb on ecb.electricity_battery_id is not null and ecb.electricity_battery_id=eb.id left join t_electricity_battery_model as ebm on eb.model_id=ebm.id WHERE ebm.voltage is not null or ebm.capacity is not null and ec.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_electricity_cabinet
sn = #{sn},
name = #{name},
address = #{address},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
product_key = #{productKey},
device_name = #{deviceName},
device_secret = #{deviceSecret},
usable_status = #{usableStatus},
power_status = #{powerStatus},
online_status = #{onlineStatus},
model_id = #{modelId},
version = #{version},
fully_charged = #{fullyCharged},
service_phone = #{servicePhone},
business_time = #{businessTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
